channel.title: Murmurs from the Cloven Pine
channel.description:
Good news, Cloven Pine fans! I've started substack newsletter to discuss games I play, games I run, and thoughts on game design. [Check it out here.](https://clovenpine.substack.com/)
In the first installment, you'll see my thoughts on playing AGON on the Gauntlet with @Alun_R, running Checkpoint Midnight as Quarterly on the Gauntlet, and the Magpie Game Design Festival.
Sign up so you don't miss future installments, and feel free to send me your thoughts and questions on game design to inspire future discussion sections!

item.title: Murmurs from the Cloven Pine
item.dc:creator: @Jesseabe
item.description:
@Jesseabe wrote:

Very much enjoyed reading this. I’m excited to see how the concept of holding environment affects your development of Checkpoint: Midnight.

Read full topic

@Alun_R wrote:

Excellent first issue … flattered to get a mention (or two )
